sentences.sContent: He strode across the bathroom, shedding wet clothes as he went.
sentences.sCn: 他大步走过浴室，边走边把湿衣服脱下来。

sentences.sContent: ...Leah shed the safety of her accounting job and made the switch complete...
...There is no scientific evidence as yet that animals can shed tears from emotion...
...Frequency of crying varies widely: some shed tears at any novel or movie...
...they cannot shed tears--sometimes even for years after their loved one has gone...

trans.tranOther: to drop something or allow it to fall
